metadata.title: Comprehensive Validation Checklist
metadata.purpose: Comprehensive validation checklist for all operations

critical-notice.requirement: This validation checklist MUST be used for all operations. No agent creation, command creation, file operation, or session can proceed without completing appropriate validation checks.

validation-philosophy.principle: Every operation must be validated before execution. Every result must be verified after completion. Quality is not optional - it's the foundation of trust.

check.title: Agent Purpose Defined
check.pass-criteria: Clear, specific purpose statement present
check.error-handling: If missing, block creation until purpose defined
check.recovery: Use /agent-purpose-generator command to create purpose statement

check.title: Agent Specialization Verified
check.pass-criteria: Specialization matches one of: research, script, audio, quality, data, development
check.error-handling: If invalid specialization, reject with error message
check.recovery: Provide valid specialization options and examples

check.title: Dependencies Validated
check.pass-criteria: All required APIs, libraries, and configurations available
check.error-handling: List missing dependencies and block creation
check.recovery: Install missing dependencies or provide mock configurations

check.title: Configuration Schema Compliance
check.pass-criteria: Configuration validates against defined schema
check.error-handling: Display schema validation errors with specific field guidance
check.recovery: Auto-correct common errors or provide corrected template

check.title: API Key Security Check
check.pass-criteria: No hardcoded API keys or sensitive data
check.error-handling: Block creation and flag security violation
check.recovery: Move sensitive data to environment variables

check.title: Permission Scope Validation
check.pass-criteria: Requested permissions match minimum required for agent function
check.error-handling: Reject excessive permissions with explanation
check.recovery: Provide minimal required permissions configuration

check.title: Cost Estimation Validation
check.pass-criteria: Estimated costs within acceptable range ($0.10-$2.00 per execution)
check.error-handling: Warn if costs exceed thresholds and require approval
check.recovery: Suggest optimization strategies or usage limits

check.title: Rate Limiting Configuration
check.pass-criteria: Appropriate rate limits set for external API usage
check.error-handling: Block if no rate limits configured for external APIs
check.recovery: Auto-configure conservative rate limits

check.title: Resource Availability Check
check.pass-criteria: Sufficient system resources available
check.error-handling: Queue execution or scale down resource requirements
check.recovery: Wait for resources or use resource-optimized execution mode

check.title: External Service Health
check.pass-criteria: All required external services responding within 5 seconds
check.error-handling: Use fallback services or cached data
check.recovery: Retry with exponential backoff or graceful degradation

check.title: Input Data Schema Validation
check.pass-criteria: Input data conforms to expected schema and types
check.error-handling: Reject invalid input with specific error messages
check.recovery: Data sanitization and type coercion where safe

check.title: Input Size Limits
check.pass-criteria: Input data within size limits (typically 10MB max)
check.error-handling: Truncate or reject oversized input
check.recovery: Chunk large inputs or provide size reduction guidance

check.title: Execution Time Monitoring
check.test: Monitor execution time continuously during runtime
check.pass-criteria: Execution completes within timeout (30 minutes max)
check.error-handling: Terminate long-running executions gracefully
check.recovery: Save partial results and provide continuation options

check.title: Error Rate Monitoring
check.test: Track API errors and retry attempts in real-time
check.pass-criteria: Error rate < 5%, retry success rate > 80%
check.error-handling: Escalate to fallback mechanisms
check.recovery: Switch to alternative service providers or cached responses

check.title: Output Schema Compliance
check.pass-criteria: Output matches expected structure and data types
check.error-handling: Mark execution as failed and flag for review
check.recovery: Re-execute with corrected parameters or manual intervention

check.title: Content Quality Metrics
check.pass-criteria: All quality thresholds met (comprehension ‚â•0.85, etc.)
check.error-handling: Trigger quality improvement workflow
check.recovery: Re-execute with quality optimization flags

check.title: Completeness Verification
check.pass-criteria: All required output fields present and non-empty
check.error-handling: Mark as incomplete and trigger re-execution
check.recovery: Partial result acceptance with flagging for later completion

check.title: Command Structure Validation
check.pass-criteria: Valid command structure with required sections
check.error-handling: Display syntax errors with line numbers
check.recovery: Provide command template and syntax examples

check.title: Parameter Schema Validation
check.pass-criteria: All parameters have types, descriptions, and validation rules
check.error-handling: List missing parameter specifications
check.recovery: Auto-generate parameter specifications from usage examples

check.title: File Existence Check
check.test: test -f {file_path} for modifications, test -d {parent_dir} for creation
check.pass-criteria: Target exists for modifications, parent directory exists for creation
check.error-handling: Clear error messages about missing files or directories
check.recovery: Create parent directories or provide alternative paths

check.title: Permission Validation
check.test: test -r {file_path} for read, test -w {file_path} for write
check.pass-criteria: Appropriate permissions available for intended operation
check.error-handling: Permission denied with specific permission requirements
check.recovery: Permission adjustment commands or alternative approaches

check.title: File Lock Check
check.test: lsof {file_path} or platform-specific file lock detection
check.pass-criteria: File not locked by other processes
check.error-handling: Wait for lock release or identify locking process
check.recovery: Wait with timeout or provide override options

check.title: Disk Space Check
check.test: df -h {target_directory} and compare with expected file size
check.pass-criteria: Sufficient disk space for operation (at least 20% free space)
check.error-handling: Insufficient space warning with cleanup suggestions
check.recovery: Cleanup procedures or alternative storage locations

check.title: File Size Limits
check.test: Check file size against system and application limits
check.pass-criteria: File size within acceptable ranges (typically < 100MB)
check.error-handling: Size limit exceeded with compression suggestions
check.recovery: File compression, splitting, or alternative storage

check.title: File Format Validation
check.pass-criteria: File format matches expected type (JSON, MD, TXT, etc.)
check.error-handling: Format mismatch with conversion suggestions
check.recovery: Format conversion or alternative handling approaches

check.title: Content Schema Validation
check.test: JSON: jsonschema, YAML: yamllint, Markdown: markdownlint
check.pass-criteria: Content validates against defined schema
check.error-handling: Schema validation errors with specific line numbers
check.recovery: Auto-correction where safe or manual correction guidance

check.title: Reading Ease Validation
check.pass-criteria: Flesch Reading Ease score 60-80 (target: 70)
check.error-handling: Score outside range with readability improvement suggestions
check.recovery: Text simplification or complexity adjustment recommendations

check.title: Grade Level Check
check.pass-criteria: Grade level 8-12 (target: 10)
check.error-handling: Grade level outside target with adjustment guidance
check.recovery: Vocabulary and sentence structure modification suggestions

check.title: Sentence Length Analysis
check.pass-criteria: Average sentence length 15-25 words (target: 20)
check.error-handling: Sentence length outside range with restructuring suggestions
check.recovery: Sentence splitting or combination recommendations

check.title: Intellectual Humility Validation
check.pass-criteria: 3-5 humility phrases per 1000 words (target: 5)
check.error-handling: Insufficient humility phrases with addition suggestions
check.recovery: Humility phrase integration recommendations

check.title: Question Density Check
check.pass-criteria: 2-4 questions per 1000 words (target: 4)
check.error-handling: Question density outside range with adjustment suggestions
check.recovery: Question integration or reduction recommendations

check.title: Avoided Terms Check
check.pass-criteria: Maximum 2 avoided terms, target 0
check.error-handling: Avoided terms present with replacement suggestions
check.recovery: Term replacement recommendations

check.title: Hook Effectiveness
check.pass-criteria: Hook effectiveness score ‚â•0.75 (target: 0.90)
check.error-handling: Low hook effectiveness with improvement suggestions
check.recovery: Hook strengthening recommendations and examples

check.title: Sentence Variety Analysis
check.pass-criteria: Sentence variety score ‚â•0.70 (target: 0.85)
check.error-handling: Low sentence variety with diversification suggestions
check.recovery: Sentence structure variation recommendations

check.title: Engagement Phrase Count
check.pass-criteria: 5-8 engagement phrases present (target: 8)
check.error-handling: Insufficient engagement phrases with addition suggestions
check.recovery: Engagement phrase integration recommendations

check.title: Duration Accuracy Check
check.pass-criteria: Estimated duration within 2 minutes of 27-minute target
check.error-handling: Duration outside tolerance with adjustment calculations
check.recovery: Script length modification recommendations

check.title: Structure Compliance Validation
check.pass-criteria: Introduction, main segments, conclusion, transitions all present
check.error-handling: Missing structural elements with template guidance
check.recovery: Structure completion recommendations

check.title: Audio Quality Validation
check.pass-criteria: Clarity ‚â•0.90, consistent volume, natural pacing configured
check.error-handling: Audio settings outside quality parameters
check.recovery: Audio configuration optimization suggestions

check.title: Budget Availability Check
check.pass-criteria: Sufficient budget available for estimated operation cost
check.error-handling: Budget exceeded warning with cost reduction options
check.recovery: Cost optimization suggestions or budget approval process

check.title: Cost Estimation Accuracy
check.pass-criteria: Cost estimate within 10% of historical actuals
check.error-handling: Estimate accuracy warning with revision suggestions
check.recovery: Revised estimation or contingency budget allocation

check.title: Cost Accumulation Tracking
check.pass-criteria: Actual costs tracking within 20% of estimates
check.error-handling: Cost overrun alerts with intervention options
check.recovery: Operation termination or budget reallocation

check.title: Cost Threshold Alerts
check.pass-criteria: No threshold violations or appropriate approvals obtained
check.error-handling: Threshold violation with escalation procedures
check.recovery: Emergency stop or expedited approval process

hook.title: Pre-operation Hooks
hook.script: #!/bin/bash # .claude/hooks/pre-agent-creation.sh echo "üîç Running pre-agent validation..." .claude/shared/quality-gates/validate_agent_pre_flight.py --config "$1" if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "‚ùå Pre-agent validation failed" exit 1 fi

rules.rule: No Operation Without Validation - Every agent creation must pass pre-flight validation
Quality Gate Compliance - All content must meet minimum quality thresholds
Cost Control Enforcement - All operations must have cost estimates validated
Documentation Requirements - All validation results must be documented

automated-enforcement.title: Automated Enforcement
automated-enforcement.enforcement-script:
#!/bin/bash # .git/hooks/pre-commit echo "üîç Running pre-commit validation..."
# Check if any validation checklists have been updated if git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "(validation|quality)" > /dev/null; then echo "üìã Validation configuration changes detected"
# Validate the validation configuration itself .claude/shared/quality-gates/validate_validation_config.py if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "‚ùå Validation configuration is invalid" exit 1 fi fi
echo "‚úÖ Pre-commit validation passed"

steps.step: Before starting any operation: Run appropriate validation checklist
During operation execution: Monitor validation status through real-time hooks
After operation completion: Verify operation results and generate validation report

activities.activity: Track validation success rates over time
Implement predictive validation based on patterns
Optimize validation performance and resource usage
Regular review and update of validation criteria
Incorporation of lessons learned from failures

section.title: Core Principles

principles.principle: Every validation step serves a specific quality purpose
Automated validation enables consistent quality at scale
Comprehensive validation builds trust and reliability
Continuous improvement ensures validation stays relevant

section.final-reminder:
This validation checklist is your quality assurance foundation. Use it consistently, trust its guidance, and improve it continuously. Quality is not accidental - it's the result of systematic validation.
**EVERY OPERATION. EVERY TIME. NO EXCEPTIONS.**
